QuestData.Title: The Menders' Stead
QuestData.Description: I can handle training from here. If you're looking for something else to do, I recommend heading up the road to the northwest. The Cenarion druids and Argent Crusade have a small camp set up there, at Dalson's old farm. Maybe they can keep you busy until we need your help again.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Field Agent Kaartish at the Menders' Stead in Western Plaguelands.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Field Agent Kaartish at the Menders' Stead in Western Plaguelands.
